channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Jim Carrey Wanted to Become the Grinch at All Costs
item.description: The Ron Howard movie turns 25 this year, and its star recalls the torture he went through to portray Dr. Seuss' Christmas-loathing character.

item.title: 5K monitors are finally going mainstream? Asus unleashes ROG Strix true 5120p monitor with 90-day Adobe Creative Cloud subs, but we're missing a critical piece
item.description: Asus ROG Strix XG27JCG combines 5K resolution, high refresh, HDR, AI motion features, and creative workflow suitability with flexible ergonomics.

item.title: Did AMD just launch the fastest silent video cards ever? Passively cooled 32GB DDR6 Radeon AI Pro R9700S debuts with ginormous 300W TDP
item.description: AMD Radeon AI PRO R9700S offers 32GB memory, passive cooling, and high FP32 compute performance for dense AI workstation setups.

item.title: ChatGPT’s adult mode is coming — and it might not be what you think it is
item.description: OpenAI will introduce a ChatGPT adult mode in 2026, pending the success of its age verification AI currently in testing.

item.title: Tesla’s Cheap Model Y and Model 3 Aren’t Slowing Down Its Sliding Sales: Report
item.description: The Cybertruck isn't pulling its own weight either.

item.title: Is the US afraid of Huawei? Reports point to the Ascend 910C accelerator’s performance to explain the surprising reversal of Nvidia's H200 AI GPU ban on China
item.description: The US permits Nvidia H200 exports to China as Huawei’s Ascend 910C chips demonstrate competitive AI compute performance and potential.

item.title: ‘Star Wars’ and Deadpool Bring Festive Themed Treats to Disneyland
item.description: Eat your way through Disney Parks this season with Chewbacca-endorsed Life Day fare at Galaxy's Edge and chimichangas at Avengers Campus.

item.title: Parents call for New York governor to sign landmark AI safety bill
item.description: A group of more than 150 parents sent a letter on Friday to New York governor Kathy Hochul, urging her to sign the Responsible AI Safety and Education (RAISE) Act without changes. The RAISE Act is a buzzy bill that would require developers of large AI models - like Meta, OpenAI, Deepseek, and Google - […]

item.title: Amazon pulls its bad AI video recaps after Fallout fallout
item.description: Amazon has responded to viewers catching errors in its AI-generated season recaps by apparently pulling them from Prime Video. The company announced its new Video Recaps feature in November as a way to make it easier to jump into a new season of a show, but the feature had issues: A recap created for Fallout included factual errors about the plot and the setting of the show.On Prime Video, recaps can be played in the "Extras" section if you're watching on the web, or via a dedicated "recap button" on the show's page, according to Amazon's original Video Recaps announcement. If you head to the ...

item.title: Now is a good time to buy a Tesla – the EV giant is offering free upgrades and enticing finance deals to drive sales
item.description: Been pondering buying a Tesla? It's just launched a range of incentives in North America to help boost sales – here's what you can get.

item.title: Former Accenture employee charged by DoJ for cloud security fraud
item.description: The defendant allegedly hid her employer’s lack of security controls.

item.title: Riding onboard with Rivian’s race to autonomy
item.description: Rivian demonstrated the progress it's made, and in the process showed just how far it still has to go to make its cars autonomous.

item.title: Los Angeles woman discovers man hiding in Waymo trunk
item.description: A Los Angeles woman had quite a fright when she discovered a man in her Waymo's trunk.

item.title: This Zotac mini PC has the most powerful GPU ever bundled in a PC of this size — 16GB GeForce RTX 5060 Ti is competitive with 5070 Ti laptop edition
item.description: Zotac’s EN275060TC fits a desktop RTX 5060 Ti into a compact frame, delivering competitive performance through a hybrid PCIe power setup.

item.title: Google is bringing Gemini live translation to your headphones (unless youre using an iPhone, of course)
item.description: Google's Gemini-powered live language translation is now supported by any headphones you've got, but not any phone you've got yet.

item.title: Blue Origin’s Next Mission Is Helping Redefine Who Gets to Go to Space
item.description: Should the mission proceed as planned, it will mark a major step forward for accessibility in spaceflight—sending the first wheelchair user beyond Earth.
